content: आनंदमय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Blissful, full of joy, made up or consisting of happiness; सुषुप्तित्थान एकीभूतः प्रज्ञाघन एवानंदमयो ह्यानदभुक् <ls>Māṇḍ. Up.</ls> --यः The Supreme spirit. --या A form of Durgā. °कोषः the innermost wrapper or vesture of the body, causal frame enshrining the soul; see कोश.
